long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A terms and conditions checker that alerts users of areas of concern while browsing websites. We focus on alerting users when a website offers refunds and when they have auto subscription renewals. This MVP utilizes a question-and-answer NLP model that utilizes BURT vectors. 

Our long-term goal for this product is to use crowd-sourcing to build a reliable NLP model for legal jargon (which does not exist yet) and educate consumers. Future iterations also include updates to hitting more websites, implementing crowd sourcing, fine-tuning the model, and providing more areas of concern.

To learn more about us, our product, and our LLC, please visit our website: https://www.ahmedjoyce.com/
